tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Grand Theft Auto IV: Hill Valley - [Back to the Future Mod Showcase]
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: DISCLAIMER: There is no single "Download Link" for this mod. It's a HEAVILY CUSTOMIZED PC project from a die-hard BTTF and GTA fan. It took me months to tweak everything and finally get it working right but I couldn't have done it without the help of some truly great mod makers (credits/links below). Please don't just start modifying your game without researching and backing things up first. You WILL break it. I made this video mostly to show what can still be done with this amazing game and to give other BTTF fans some information on how to create something similar, though not exact. I'll answer simple questions but I can't train you on how to mod GTA...you'll have to do some research yourself, if you're up to it! It's a hell of a lot more than just installing a skin or two...we're talking hours and hours of editing files. I've only played with it for a few hours now but it was totally worth it. Also, check out my BTTF "Twinkle" sound ringtone I made a while back: www.youtube.com Inspiration to do all of this: BTTF Hill Valley Vice City project. Link: www.bttfhillvalley.com MOD LIST - **ONLY ATTEMPT IF YOU KNOW YOUR WAY AROUND GTA MODDING** -Time Travel Mod - **NO OFFICIAL RELEASE YET** - I toyed with a beta copy of BTTF92it's ( www.youtube.com ) excellent TT mod and he has asked I not release it yet. Check out his channel and stay tuned for updates! -GTA4 Simple Trainer - Link: www.gtagaming.com -GTA Realistic Environment Mod v5 - Link: www.gtagarage.com -ASI Loader + ...

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Hearing Erock's music in this video makes me smile :) A really impressive project,﻿ awesome!
I hope it can﻿ fly like in Vice City :-)
Way to make it awesomer: when you time-jump, you go to GTA I,﻿ together with that pixelated top-down view and that legendary soundtrack.
actually the modders﻿ will always be better then pro dev :))
I can totally see this as a Freddiew video one day.... ﻿
you﻿ should make a gta days mod with fps

As long as the technology keeps up with the devs, then yes.
That's obvious, because modders LOVE what they're doing. Devs do it for a pay cheque.﻿
Shut up and take my money!﻿ Excellent!
wtf?? whow﻿ we can go to the year 1010 if us doesnt exist???

I know it wouldn't make any sense since it's two different places and the programming would be insane but wouldn't it be hilarious if going back in time caused the game﻿ to become Vice City or San Andreas?
Do you think this is able to be put into the xbox﻿ of the codeing was right and the system was rgh'd or a jtag?
The land﻿ would still be there

Reviewer.Books: are not as good as movies

(Too many to list here)
